name: visualizacion-barrios
description: Mapa coropl√©tico de barrios de CABA para Looker Studio

scripts.deploy:js: npm run build && gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/javascript" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp dist/Visualization.js gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/barrios-caba-map-v2025/Visualization.js
scripts.deploy:css: if [ -f dist/Visualization.css ]; then gsutil -h "Content-Type: text/css" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp dist/Visualization.css gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/barrios-caba-map-v2025/Visualization.css; else echo "No CSS to deploy"; fi
scripts.deploy:assets: gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/json" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp public/Config.json gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/barrios-caba-map-v2025/Config.json && gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/json" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp public/manifest.json gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/barrios-caba-map-v2025/manifest.json && gsutil -h "Content-Type: image/png" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp public/Logo.png gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/barrios-caba-map-v2025/Logo.png && gsutil -h "Content-Type: image/png" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp public/Icon.png gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/barrios-caba-map-v2025/Icon.png
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:js && npm run deploy:css && npm run deploy:assets
